com.alee.utils.swing
Class ListRolloverSelectionAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.alee.utils.swing.ListRolloverSelectionAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ListRolloverSelectionAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

User: mgarin Date: 24.08.12 Time: 14:20

This adapter allows you to install (and uninstallcif needed) select-on-rollover behavior to any JList quickly without any additional coding.

Constructor Summary
ListRolloverSelectionAdapter(javax.swing.JList list)
           
 
Method Summary
static ListRolloverSelectionAdapter install(javax.swing.JList list)
          Installs rollover selection adapter and ensures that it is the only installed
static boolean isInstalled(javax.swing.JList list)
          Checks if list has any rollover selection adapter installed

          Ignored method
 void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          Performs selection change on rollover
static void uninstall(javax.swing.JList list)
          Uninstalls any existing rollover selection adapters from list
